original_text: Wherefore the sin of the young men was very great before the Lord: for men abhorred the offering of the Lord.
korean_text: 이 소년들의 죄가 여호와 앞에 심히 큼은 그들이 여호와의 제사를 멸시함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Wherefore the sin of the young men
was very great before the Lord
for men abhorred the offering of the Lord
